Token.Abstract: RKSearchPredicate is a suclass of NSCompoundPredicate used to represent textual search operations against entities indexed by an instance of RKSearchIndexer.

Creates and returns a new predicate for performing a full text search on an entity indexed by an instance of RKSearchIndexer. The given search text will be tokenized, normalized and used to construct a collection of subpredicates specifying a BEGINSWITH match against the searchWords relationship of the searchable entity.

Parameter.Name: searchText
Parameter.Abstract: A string of text with which to construct subpredicates for searching.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of the new compound predicate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new compound predicate for performing a full text search with the given search text and type.

Token.Abstract: Initializes the receiver with a string of search text and a compound predicate type.

Parameter.Name: searchText
Parameter.Abstract: A string of text with which to construct subpredicates for searching.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The type of the new compound predicate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver with its type set to the given type and its subpredicates set to an array of subpredicates for searching for the given text.
